title: Man accidentally shoots girlfriend, Colorado Springs police say
content:
A 22-year-old man was arrested Monday after he accidentally shot his girlfriend, Colorado Springs police said.
Joseph Hettle fired the shot while he was handling a handgun at the woman's apartment on the 2300 block of Skyview Lane on Colorado Springs' west side, police said. The woman, 19, went to the hospital with a non-life threatening injury.
